searchUrl:
<js> var body = {
  "sort": "default",
  "page": 1,
  "q": "{{key}}",
  "rootKind": "",
  "query": "
    query getFilterWorksList($works_ids: [ID!]) {
      worksList(worksIds: $works_ids) {
        
    
    title
    cover
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel
  
    
    url
    title
  
    
    author {
      name
      url
    }
    origAuthor {
      name
      url
    }
    translator {
      name
      url
    }
  
    
    abstract
    editorHighlight
  
    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    isNew
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
  
  
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
  
    isInLibrary
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
  
        id
        isOrigin
      }
    }
  ",
  "variables": {}
};
var option = {"method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(body) }; "https://read.douban.com/j/search_v2," + JSON.stringify(option) </js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var json=JSON.parse(result).Data;
var bid=json.BookId;
var base="https://m.qidian.com/book/"+bid+"/";

json.Chapters.slice(1).map(ch=>({
title:ch.N,
link:base+ch.C,
vip:ch.V,
time:java.timeFormat(ch.T)
}))
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//取正文
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="[A-Z].*?">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?浏览器！/g,"")
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

var o = selector =>String(J.select(selector).text());

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));

var book = {
      name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费阅读|最新章节).*|（.*）/,''),

      author: og('novel:author'),

      kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/,''),

      latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/,''), 

      intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/,' ').replace(/\//g,'-') + '\n' + o('#intro p:eq(0)').replace(/.*(观看小说:|简介：)|各位书友.*/,'').replace(/\s+/g,'\n'),

      cover: og('image'),

      url: og('novel:read_url'),
};

book;
</js>

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),

};

      cover: og('image'),

};

book;

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    latest: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      ),
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
      
    ].join(','),
    latest:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, '').replace(/^vip卷\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://book.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, '').replace(/更新.*/,'连载'),
  wordCount: o('.d_ac').match(/.*字数：(.*) \|.*/)[1],
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.d_co').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
